猵猵猵
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

Related Character(s): 獱
Связанный символ (и): 獱

猵字的基本解释

猵
biān
古书上说的一种獭类动物：“夫畜池鱼者必去猵獭。”

猵
piàn
　ㄆㄧㄢˋ
〔猵狙〕古书上说的一种似猿，头如犬的兽。

猵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biān］
［《廣韻》布玄切，平先，幫。］
［《廣韻》毗忍切，上軫，並。］
(1)獭的一种。能入水食鱼。
(2)见“猵狹”。
[②]［piàn］
［《集韻》匹羡切，去綫，滂。］
见“猵2狙”。

猵字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　猵； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页715第19
【唐韻】布懸切【集韻】?眠切，?音邊。【說文】獺屬。从犬，扁聲。或作獱。【淮南子·兵略訓】畜池魚者，必去猵獺。　又【集韻】【韻會】紕延切【正韻】紕連切，?音篇。【玉篇】獺屬。　又【集韻】猵狙，猿類。一曰非類，爲牝牡也。◎按猵狙莊子作猵狚。詳狚字註。　又【廣韻】毗忍切【集韻】婢忍切，?音牝。獺屬。　又【集韻】毗賔切，音頻。本作獱。義同。　又【五音集韻】芳未切，音費。猵狙，獸名。似猿而狗頭。　又【集韻】匹羨切，音騗。義同。

猵字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
猵字的起名意思

暂无。

猵
Basic explanation of words
猵
biān
A kind of otter animal in ancient books: "The husband's pond fish must go to the otter."
猵
piàn
Po ㄧ ㄢ
〔猵猵〕An ape-like beast whose head is like a dog is said in ancient books.
猵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［biān］
["Guangyun" Buxuanqie, Pingxian, help. ]
["Guangyun" Pirenqie, Shangzhen, and. ]
(1) A kind of otter. Can enter the water and eat fish.
(2) See "猵 narrow".
[②]［piàn］
["Ji Yun" The horse is enviously cut, go to the line, and furious. ]
See "猵2 Sniper".
猵
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　猵; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 715 19
[Tang Yun] Cloth Suspension Cut [Ji Yun] Sleep cut, sound edge. [Said the text] Otter is the genus. From the dog, flat sound. Or as a 獱. 【Huainanzi·Strategic Training】Those who live with pond fish must go to the otter.　 [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] Yan Yanqie [Zheng Yun] Yan Lianqie, the sound chapter. [Jade articles] Otter is the genus.　 [Ji Yun] 猵 sniper, ape. One said that it is not a class, but it is also a Minmu. ◎According to Zhuangzi to make a 猵狚. Detailed note of the word.　[Guangyun] Pirenqie [Jiyun] Maid Renqie,? Yin Su. Otter.　[Jiyun] Phi-cut, audio. This is a scorpion. The same meaning.　 [Five Yin Ji Yun] Fang is not cut, the sound fee. The name of the beast. Like an ape but a dog's head.　[Jiyun] The horse is envious and cut, and the sound. The same meaning.
